title: Trust Gate
description: Defines access rules based on Gems and Verifiable Credentials.

resource.description: The DID or URL of the resource being accessed.

requiredTrustLevel.description: Minimum trust score required for access.

requiredGems.description: List of required Gems for access.

requiredCredentials.description: List of required Verifiable Credentials for access.

accessPolicy.description: Whether access is open, trust-restricted, or fully private.
